CREATE or ALTER PROCEDURE RegisterView
(@schemaname varchar(50),
@tablename varchar(150),
@lakeaccount varchar(50),
@filepath varchar(250),
@fileformat varchar(50))
AS
BEGIN

    if ((select count(*) from sys.views s where s.name = @tablename) = 0 ) 
    BEGIN
        declare @sql nvarchar(max) = 
        'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW '+@schemaname+'.'+@tablename+'
        AS
        SELECT 
            *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK ''https://'+@lakeaccount+'.dfs.core.windows.net/'+@filepath+''',
        FORMAT='''+@fileformat+''',PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        ) AS [result]'

        exec sp_executesql @tsql = @sql
    END

END
